ModMetaData.name: [SMP] Simple Archotech Implants
ModMetaData.author: accrrsd
ModMetaData.description:
Adds simple Archotech organs that have 150% efficiency just like vanilla ones. They can't be crafted, the only way to get them is to find them, get them from a task, or buy them from a trader.
Adds: stomach, liver, heart, lungs, ears, spine, kidneys, jaw, brain chip, skin. Each of these bodies has interesting, close to vanilla royalty balance. However, royalty is not required.
